introduction.para: This procedure does not apply to the limited series "TEAM TROPHY".

noteR.para: Consult the safety and cleanliness advice and operation recommendations before carrying out any repairairbag and pretensioners : precautions for the repairGIEMR-000004(88C, Airbags and pretensioners).

To avoid any risk of triggering when working on or near a passive safety component, apply the procedure for deactivating the safety systemsairbag and pretensioners : precautions for the repairGIEMR-000004(88C, Airbags and pretensioners).
Never handle the pyrotechnic systems (pretensioners or airbags) near to a source of heat or naked flame - they may be triggered.

procstep.para: Lock the airbag computer using theDiagnostic tool(see Fault finding - Replacement of components ) (88C, Airbags and pretensioners).
Disconnect the battery12 V battery : removal - refittingGIEMR-000248(80A, Battery).
Remove the complete front seatfront seat assembly : removal - refittingGIEMR-000987.

ul.li: the front seat lower casingsfront seat lower casing : removal - refittingGIEMR-000331,
the front headrestfront seat headrest : removal - refittingGIEMR-000034,
the front seatback trimfront seatback trim : removal - refittingGIEMR-000560,
the front seat base trimfront seat base cover : removal - refittingGIEMR-000555,
the front seat runnersfront seat runner : removal - refittingGIEMR-001369,
the front seat belt buckle stalkfront seat belt buckle : removal - refittingGIEMR-001852(88C, Airbags and pretensioners).

procstep.para: Remove the front side airbag (chest)front thorax-level side airbag : removal - refittingGIEMR-000012(88C, Airbags and pretensioners).
Refit the front side airbag (chest)front thorax-level side airbag : removal - refittingGIEMR-000012(88C, Airbags and pretensioners).

ul.li: the front seat belt bucklefront seat belt buckle : removal - refittingGIEMR-001852(88C, Airbags and pretensioners),
the front seat runnersfront seat runner : removal - refittingGIEMR-001369,
the front seat base trimfront seat base cover : removal - refittingGIEMR-000555,
the front seatback trimfront seatback trim : removal - refittingGIEMR-000560,
the front headrestfront seat headrest : removal - refittingGIEMR-000034,
the front seat lower casingsfront seat lower casing : removal - refittingGIEMR-000331.

procstep.para: Refit the complete front seatfront seat assembly : removal - refittingGIEMR-000987.
Connect the battery12 V battery : removal - refittingGIEMR-000248(80A, Battery).
Unlock the airbag computer using theDiagnostic tool(see Fault finding - Replacement of components ) (88C, Airbags and pretensioners).
